body:
- requesting the installation of IIS on server use1pres2368
- in addition we would need support for .NET 6
(https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/aspnet/core/host-and-deploy/iis/?view=aspnetcore-6.0)
- the dev team needs admin rights to move code (jpeper, szurolo)
- each app requires a service account
DNS has been requested in a different ticket.
IIS Applications:
Claros
PREPROD ushclaros-db-pre -> (use1pres2398)
APP SERVER ushclaros-pre, ushclaros-s-pre -> (use1pres2368)
SERVICE ACCOUNT ushclarospresvr
Firewall This App servers need access to the DB server use1pres2398
USPRICINGANALYTICS
PREPROD ushpricinganalytics-db-pre -> (use1pres2398)
APP SERVER ushpricinganalytics-pre, ushpricinganalytics-s-pre -> (use1pres2368)
SERVICE ACCOUNT ushpricealyticspresrv
Firewall This App servers need access to the DB server use1pres2398
USPRICING
DB ushpricing-db-pre -> (use1pres2681) 
APP SERVER ushpricing -pre, ushpricing -s-pre -> (use1pres2368)
Firewall This App servers need access to the DB server use1pres2398
